compatibility.notes: The GPL-3.0-with-autoconf-exception license requires that any derivative work or combined work must also be licensed under GPL-3.0 or a compatible license. Static linking typically leads to full contamination, while dynamic linking may allow for some exceptions depending on the nature of the linking.

key_requirements: Maintain the copyleft provisions of the GPLv3 for any derivative works.
State any changes made to the original code.
Include copyright notices and license information in all copies or substantial portions of the software.
license.name: GPL-3.0-with-autoconf-exception
obligations: If you modify Autoconf and cause Ineligible Code to become Normally Copied Code, you must remove the Exception.
You must include the GPLv3 license text when distributing the software.
You must provide a copy of the license with any distribution.
